main event: A civilian employee and a corporal from the Canadian forces sighted an orange-red glow that appeared to change in size before disappearing behind clouds.
interesting points: The sighting indicated an increase and then a decrease in size of the object., The object was seen at an altitude of 23 degrees., The sighting lasted for approximately 3-5 minutes., The report originated from military sources., Observers concluded it was probably a meteor based on the observations.
witness description: a civilian employee and a corporal of the Canadian forces
